channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Active Directory Integration / LDAP Integration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Active Directory Integration / LDAP Integration

item.title: CVE-2023-5003|2023-10-16T19:39:08.657Z -- unknown -- active%20directory%20integration%20%2F%20ldap%20integration
item.description: The Active Directory Integration / LDAP Integration WordPress plugin before 4.1.10 stores sensitive LDAP logs in a buffer file when an administrator wants to export said logs. Unfortunately, this log file is never removed, and remains accessible to any users knowing the URL to do so.

item.title: CVE-2023-0812|2023-05-15T12:15:39.193Z -- unknown -- active%20directory%20integration%20%2F%20ldap%20integration
item.description: The Active Directory Integration / LDAP Integration WordPress plugin before 4.1.1 does not have proper authorization or nonce values for some POST requests, leading to unauthenticated data disclosure.
